name: Shroodle
flavorText: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.

previous.name: Mabosstiff
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon can store energy in its large dewlap. Mabosstiff unleashes this energy all at once to blow away enemies.

next.name: Grafaiai
next.flavorText: The color of the poisonous saliva depends on what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.
